StoryNodes.Title: A Tense Meeting
StoryNodes.Text: You encounter NPC1, a representative of The Collective, in DO NOT ADD ANY. They seem guarded but willing to speak about recent events: Expose the corporation covering up illegal AI experiments

Choices.Label: Try to persuade them (appeal to empathy)

StoryNodes.Title: They Open Up
StoryNodes.Text: NPC1 relaxes and shares a hint: 'There's a meeting at the old docks tonight. Someone from The Collective will be there.'

StoryNodes.Title: Threat Escalates
StoryNodes.Text: NPC1 narrows their eyes. The conversation ends badly; guards are alerted and you must flee.

StoryNodes.Title: You Walk Away
StoryNodes.Text: You decide not to press the issue. NPC1 watches you go, unreadable.

StoryNodes.Title: End
StoryNodes.Text: The conversation ends.
